## WCH\_CONTEXT\_EDIT\_HOST\_WINDOW variable

Injects the window that acts as the edit host for an application. This is typically the parent window or the opener window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
WCH_CONTEXT_EDIT_HOST_WINDOW: Required<import("react").Context<WindowType>>
```
